## Requirements
- brightnessctl (optional)
- otf-hasklig-nerd
- pacman-contrib
- pamixer
- playerctl (optional)
- python-dbus-next
- python-psutil
- qtile-extras (AUR)
- qtile
- ttf-nerd-fonts-symbols-mono
